name: Unnatural Selection
description:
“Four Player Party-Shooter Featuring Cute Animals Wielding Wacky Guns.”

Play as animals and fight your friends to win the tournament!
Eliminate the most players to win the round!
Use the terrain, traps, and events to your advantage to take home the win!

- Fight with a variety of unique guns, including weapons such as the Plunge-O-Matic and the D.A.R.T. Gun!
- Play with a wacky cast of characters, from Foxes to Whales!
- Events add an additional level of crazy to gameplay, changing the movement and the environment!
- Player with the most wins after 4 rounds will take home the Victory!
- Watch out for that hammer!
